title: Love the multi-currency support!
description: The ability to handle ZAR, USD, and EUR seamlessly has made our international transactions so much easier. Great feature for South African businesses!

title: Request: Integration with SARS eFiling
description: It would be amazing if we could submit VAT returns directly through the system to SARS eFiling portal.

title: BEE Compliance Reporting
description: Please add support for Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment compliance reporting. This is critical for SA businesses.

title: Excellent CIPC integration
description: The Companies and Intellectual Property Commission integration saves us so much time. Well done!
